code: import{withStyles}from"@material-ui/core/styles";import TextField from"@material-ui/core/TextField";import React from"react";var BccInput=withStyles({root:{"& .MuiInputBase-root":{color:"#000D1A",fontSize:"16px"},"& .MuiFormHelperText-contained":{marginLeft:0},"& label.Mui-focused":{color:"#27AE60"},"& .MuiInputLabel-outlined":{color:"#4D565F",fontSize:16,"&.Mui-focused":{color:"#4D565F","&.Mui-error":{color:"#C84F4F"}}},"& .MuiInputLabel-shrink.MuiInputLabel-filled":{fontSize:13,color:"#4D565F"},"& .MuiInputLabel-filled":{color:"#4D565F",fontSize:16,"&.Mui-focused":{color:"#4D565F","&.Mui-error":{color:"#C84F4F"}}},"& .MuiInput-underline:hover":{"&:before":{borderBottomColor:"#2D72E5"}},"& .MuiInput-underline:before":{borderBottomColor:"#2D72E5"},"& .MuiInput-underline:after":{borderBottomColor:"#2D72E5"},"& .MuiOutlinedInput-root":{"& fieldset":{borderColor:"#E8E8E8"},"&:hover fieldset":{borderColor:"#80868C"},"&.Mui-focused fieldset":{borderColor:"#2D72E5",borderWidth:1},"&.Mui-disabled fieldset":{backgroundColor:"#E6E7E8",border:"none"},"&.Mui-error fieldset":{borderColor:"#C84F4F"}},"& .MuiFilledInput-root":{background:"none",border:"1px solid",borderRadius:4,borderColor:"#CCCFD1","&:before":{border:"none"},"&:after":{border:"none"},"&:hover":{borderColor:"#80868C"},"&.Mui-focused":{borderColor:"#2D72E5"},"&.Mui-disabled":{backgroundColor:"#E6E7E8",border:"none"},"&.Mui-error":{borderColor:"#C84F4F"}}}})(function(props){return React.createElement(TextField,Object.assign({variant:props.variant?props.variant:"filled"},props));});export default BccInput;
